name: LoansSDKTest
summary: LoansSDKTest is a simple wrapper for Keychain that   works on iOS and OS X. Makes using Keychain APIs as easy as NSUserDefaults
description:
LoansSDKTest is a simple wrapper for Keychain that works on iOS and OS X.
Makes using Keychain APIs as easy as NSUserDefaults.

Features
  - Simple interface
  - Support access group
  - [Support accessibility](#accessibility)
  - [Support iCloud sharing](#icloud_sharing)
  - **[Support TouchID and Keychain integration (iOS 7+)](#touch_id_integration)**
  - Works on both iOS & OS X
